summary: Adds new models by Mr Siika to Fort Neugrad as well as an army of non essential Followers for you to recruit.
descriptionHtml:
By the power invested in me by Mr Siika I bring to you a brand Neu Fort Neugrad!
Adds new models by Mr Siika to Fort Neugrad as well as an army of non essential Followers for you to recruit.

This mod is mainly for people who would like to see one of the civil war forts restored and who want an army of followers of modest skill who can be killed in battle. The followers have various combat styles and equipment for your enjoyment.

I have not touched the interiors other than to add the new follower NPC's.
Please do not complain that it broke your Civil War quest, of course it will break your civil war quest only install if you are not planning on playing the civil war or have completed it already.

Recommended Mods:
Sokco's Guild Starter: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52871/?
Homestead - Make Anywhere A Player Home: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29275/?
Spell Of Spawn 2: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29035/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D29035%26preview%3D&pUp=1

I made this mod for my own amusement and decided to share. Please take that into consideration.
author: Kyman3
